frontmatter.title: ODPF/Firehose
frontmatter.description: Extensible, no-code, and cloud-native service to load real-time streaming data from Kafka to data stores, data lakes, and analytical storage systems.

frontmatter.title: ODPF/Raccoon
frontmatter.description: A high-throughput, low-latency service to collect events in real-time from your web, mobile apps, and services using multiple network protocols.

frontmatter.title: Solar System
frontmatter.description: Mini solar system visualization using pixi.js. Replica of Gojek's bootcamp solar system.
